HediffDef.label: Race: Tiefling
HediffDef.description: Horned and horny, describes every tiefling at any table. Stats - 105% Overall Health - 110% Learning Speed - 115% Negotiation Ability - 120% Social Impact - Comfortable Temp 12-40C - Increased Mental Break Threshold Extra Info - Naturally Undergrounder - Less Flammable
